EmailTemplate.name: Turbofest London 2015.Follow Up Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Industry Leaders From HP, CGI and Barclays To Network And Learn At Turbofest London!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/register-for-turbofest-london?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbofest_London&utm_content=invite>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir or Madam}}: We are very excited to announce Andre van der Lingen from SNS Bank as a confirmed speaker for VMTurbo’s first annual Turbofest London <http://vmturbo.com/register-for-turbofest-london?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbofest_London&utm_content=invite>, in addition to already confirmed speaker Ian Penny, Managing Director and Head of Distributed Technology at Barclays. These speakers will be discussing their thoughts around OpenStack, SDN, engineering and managing scale out applications as well as future trends in cloud and virtualization. The event also presents invaluable networking opportunities with the chance to connect with innovative thought leaders from prominent companies, including: PureStorage, CGI, CitiHub and HP! This afternoon meeting and evening reception will be held Thursday, March 19, 2015 at the Andaz Liverpool Street Hotel in London. You can register here <http://vmturbo.com/register-for-turbofest-london?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbofest_London&utm_content=invite>, and a VMTurbo executive will also contact you to address any questions you may have. I hope you will attend this exciting event; it will be one to remember. Sincerely, J. Benjamin H. Nye Chief Executive Officer VMTurbo, Inc.
500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
